snippet.title: Stranded: Alien Dawn | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Brave a new world in Stranded: Alien Dawn, a planet survival sim placing the fate of a small marooned group in your hands.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1324130/Stranded_Alien_Dawn 

Forge your story through compelling and immersive strategic gameplay as you make vital decisions to protect your survivors from starvation, disease, extreme weather and more.

From basic camps to fortified bases, create a stronghold to defend the survivors from attacks by alien creatures that roam an expansive and deadly alien world. Experience an epic and unpredictable journey.

For more news and information about Stranded: Alien Dawn:

Website: www.strandedaliendawn.com 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/strandedaliendawn/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/strandedgame 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/strandedaliendawn/ 
Discord: https://discord.gg/vVThQ94zP3
